meaningMnemonic: The <radical>Not</radical> <radical>Mouth</radical> says “<kanji>no</kanji>”. What else would you expect from something named the “Not Mouth”? The Not Mouth will always say “no”, regardless of the question.
readingMnemonic: You ask the Not Mouth if it is afraid of <reading>he</reading>at (ひ). The Not Mouth says, “<kanji>no</kanji>”. So you set the Not Mouth on fire. The Not Mouth then screams, “NONONONONONONONONONOOOOOO~!” Looks like someone can’t handle the heat.
